    • Method Detail

      • newPointSource

        public static Source newPointSource(GridSourceSet parent,
                    Location loc,
                    IncrementalMFD mfd,
                    Map<FocalMech,Double> mechWtMap)
        Creates a new point earthquake source. The iterator of this Source should only ever be used by a single thread and the Ruptures it returns should never be retained as their state will change as iteration proceeds.
        Parameters:
        parent - reference to parent GridSourceSet
        loc - Location of the point source
        mfd - magnitude frequency distribution of the source
        mechWtMap - Map of focal mechanism weights
        Returns:
        a new point earthquake Source
